tableSchema.table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `USER` ( `ID` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `USER_NAME` VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, `USER_IDENTITY` VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL UNIQUE, `USER_EMAIL` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL UNIQUE, `USER_TYPE` VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, `LAST_LOGIN_DATE` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT '1900-01-01 00:00:00', `USER_STATUS` VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'AWAIT', `USER_PASSWORD` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `USER_SALT` VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `KEY_STORE` ( `ID` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `USER_ID` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `USER_EMAIL` VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL UNIQUE, `KEY_TYPE` VARCHAR(32) DEFAULT NULL, `CREATE_DATE` DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), `KEY_VALUE` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) );
